scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig-client.json && tsc -p tsconfig-server.json && tsc -p tsconfig-unlogged.json && mixin-patch
scripts.build-ignore-error: (tsc -p tsconfig-client.json || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p tsconfig-server.json  || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p tsconfig-unlogged.json || echo "continue w/error") && mixin-patch
scripts.build-cli: (tsc -p tsconfig-client.json || echo "continue w/error") && (tsc -p tsconfig-unlogged.json || echo "continue w/error") && mixin-patch
scripts.dumpb: (tsc -p tsconfig-server.json  || echo "continue w/error") && npm run dump
scripts.test: set BACKEND_PLUS_LOCAL_CONFIG=autotest-config && eslint && tsc -p tsconfig-server.json && call npm start -- --dump-db && call run-sql create-schema gestik_autotest_db && call npm run test-only-run
scripts.test-only-run: set BACKEND_PLUS_LOCAL_CONFIG=autotest-config && tsc -p tsconfig-test.json && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks dist/test/test/ --exit
